    An Empirical Evaluation of Adversarial Robustness under Transfer Learning.

    Published in ICML 2019 Understanding and Improving Generalisation Workshop, 2019

    Recommended citation: Davchev, T., Korres, T., Fotiadis, S., Antonopoulos, N. and Ramamoorthy, S., 2019. An empirical evaluation of adversarial robustness under transfer learning. arXiv preprint arXiv:1905.02675 (2019). https://arxiv.org/pdf/1905.02675.pdf

    This paper studies the effects of using robust optimisation in the context of adversarial attacks. This allows us to identify transfer learning strategies under which adversarial defences are successfully retained, in addition to revealing potential vulnerabilities.

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Davchev, T., Korres, T., Fotiadis, S., Antonopoulos, N. and Ramamoorthy, S., 2019. An empirical evaluation of adversarial robustness under transfer learning. Arxiv preprint. arXiv:1905.02675.
